import React, { useState} from "react"; const ModalCrearUsuario = ({ mostrar, onClose, onSubmit }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ nombre: "", email: "", contrasena: "", rol: "CLIENTE", // Rol predeterminado }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; if (!mostrar) return null; return (

Añadir Usuario

); }; export default ModalCrearUsuario;
